<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Twist The Knife](/Feats.aspx?ID=4947) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 173 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Requirements**
Your last action was a melee Strike that dealt sneak attack damage to an off-guard target

</column>

---

After stabbing your opponent in a weak spot, you tear the wound open. You deal persistent bleed damage to the target equal to your number of sneak attack damage dice.
